Commentary: Lakmal to Harris, no run, 126kph, inswinger, good length, he pushes on the front foot and it goes in the air for a bit towards mid on
Lakmal to Harris, 2 runs, good length, 130kph, shaping into middle, he tucks this easily past short leg behind square for two
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 131kph, good length shaping back into off, he defends on the front foot
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 130kph, shorter length wide of off, he's up on his toes defending away from his body with soft hands

Lakmal to Harris, 3 runs, 131kph, full on the pads, he clips this powerfully into the shoulder of short leg, no chance to catch it, it was middled and hit him before he could move, it runs away for three
Lakmal to Burns, no run, 130kph, good length out-swinger, he presses forward and defends with a slightly open face to point
Kumara to Harris, no run, 135kph, full on off, he pushes on the front foot to cover
Kumara to Harris, 1 run, 142kph, back of a length on leg, he clips this neatly from the crease wide of mid on for one
Kumara to Burns, no run, good length, 141kph, wide of off, he leaves this alone
Kumara to Burns, no run, 141kph, good length wide of off, he leaves again on the front foot
Kumara to Burns, no run, 136kph, full out-swinger, not a huge amount of swing, but way wide, he leaves again
Kumara to Burns, no run, wide of the crease, 142kph, angled into off, he drives on the front foot to mid on
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 129kph, good length, angled into off, he defends on the front foot to cover
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 132kph, angled down leg side, he tries to glance but misses

Lakmal to Harris, FOUR runs, whipped elegantly in the air behind square and it beats Kumara rolling on the rope! It was full and swinging into the pads and he picked this off with a lovely whip of the wrists
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 132kph, full and swinging in late, he gets an inside edge onto pad driving firmly at it
Lakmal to Harris, 1 leg bye, shorter into the hip, it comes off the thigh guard and runs behind square for a leg bye
Lakmal to Burns, no run, beaten sparring at a good length ball shaping away outside off. He just shuffled across and wafted at it
Kumara to Harris, 1 run, 142kph, good length outside off, he defends with an open faced blade, it runs past point, they take a while before deciding there's an easy one on offer
Kumara to Burns, no run, good length wide of off, he leaves this alone outside off
Kumara to Burns, FOUR runs, over-pitched and beautifully driven wide of mid off, he just leaned on it and timed it very nicely to pick up a boundary
Kumara to Burns, no run, 143kph, back of a length, nipping in and it hits him on the thigh pad
Kumara to Burns, no run, 144kph, good length on off, he presses forward and defends well
Kumara to Burns, no run, back of a length on off, he's back and defending
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 131kph, full and swinging late into the front pad, they appeal for LBW, but it was shaping well down leg. Not out and they abandoned the appeal
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 132kph, shorter length wide of off, he punches off the back foot to point
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 130kph, full on off, he pushes on the front to cover
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 129kph, good length swinging into leg, he works this off the pad to midwicket
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 130kph, good length swinging into off, he defends on the front foot with the swing into the on side
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 131kph, good length, he makes a positive stride into the ball and pushes firmly to mid off
Kumara to Burns, FOUR runs, short ball and Burns loves these, hammering this chest high offering through square leg to the fence! He's a good puller and hooker. Particularly on his home track

Kumara to Burns, FOUR runs, 145kph short again and he hooks this easily again wide of fine leg, Chameera runs around on the rope and gets there but makes a mess of the diving save it rolls into the rope
Kumara to Burns, no run, 143kph, nipping back from a good length, into the thigh guard and rolls into the off side
Kumara to Burns, no run, 144kph, good length angling in, tight leave but a very good, it swings after it passes the stumps and Dickwella has to knock it down diving left
Kumara to Burns, no run, 143kph, fuller outside off, he plays a rock solid forward defence
Kumara to Burns, no run, 142kph, good length but well side of off, he raises the bat and lets this pass
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 132kph, good length on middle and leg, he defends easily from the crease to mid on
Lakmal to Harris, no run, beaten by one that nips away! 129kph, good length but this hits the seam pitching on off and zips way past the edge
Lakmal to Harris, 2 leg byes, inside edge just flies past leg stump! He was driving at 135kph, inswinger, he drives and gets a thick inside edge it just goes past leg stump, they get two to fine leg
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 132kph, good length on leg, he tucks this off the thigh pad to square leg
Lakmal to Harris, FOUR runs, 130kph, swinging down leg and he glances this fine, too easy, and finds another boundary
Lakmal to Harris, no run, 130kph, good length wide of off, he leaves this alone on the back foot
Chameera to Burns, no run, short ball outside off, he pulls firmly but straight to mid on
Chameera to Burns, no run, 135kph, good length out-swinger wide of off, he leaves this alone
Chameera to Burns, no run, back of a length, out-swinger wide of off, he leaves off the back foot
Chameera to Burns, 2 runs, into leg stump and he clips this easily through midwicket for a couple
Chameera to Burns, no run, good length wide of off, he leaves again
Chameera to Burns, no run, angled down the leg side and he can't glance fine
Lakmal to Harris, no run, length ball on off, and angling further across. Left alone

Lakmal to Harris, 2 runs, length ball outside off, and he uncomfortably punches off the back foot. But beats cover, and that allows him to take two. Harris considered taking a third, but eventually said 'no'
Lakmal to Harris, no run, full and wide outside off, and he reaches forward to defend. But the delivery whizzes past his outside edge
Lakmal to Harris, 2 runs, length ball just outside off, from round the wicket. Punched with the bat's straight face to long off on this occasion
Lakmal to Harris, no run, full and wide outside off, and he reaches forward to drive. Splices it back to Lakmal
Lakmal to Harris, no run, full outside off again, and this time the cover drive takes an inside edge! But safely rolls away to the leg side to bring the over to a close
Chameera to Burns, no run, length ball just outside off, and he presses forward to defend with gentle hands. Played towards the leg side
Chameera to Burns, no run, length ball on off stump, and defended with the straight bat. Ball rolls away to mid off
Chameera to Burns, no run, length ball, just outside off stump, and left alone
Chameera to Burns, 1 run, back of a length on middle, and worked away off his pads to the vacant mid-wicket region. They pinch a single
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball on off, and angling further away. He covers his off stump, and then shoulders his arms to safely negate this delivery
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball on off stump, and he rocks back, using the depth of the crease to defend
Lakmal to Burns, no run,
Lakmal to Burns, no run, length ball on off stump, and defended with soft hands off the back foot

Lakmal to Burns, OUT, second slip takes a screamer! Length ball just outside off, and the ball holds it's line despite angling inwards at first. That means Burns is playing in front of middle-stump, while the ball is on off-stump, and that's what gets the bat's outside edge. Mendis dives to his left and completes a sharp take
Lakmal to Khawaja, no run, length ball, wide outside off, but angling inwards. Khawaja covers his off stump and then shoulders his arms
Lakmal to Khawaja, no run, full on off, and he tries to drive straight. But it comes off the bat's inside half, and rolls back to mid on

Lakmal to Khawaja, no run, beautiful shape from round the wicket. Length ball originating outside off but coming in sharply. Eventually well left by Khawaja, but the delivery was mighty close to the top of off stump
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball, from round the wicket. And the in-seamer is left alone
Chameera to Harris, no run, between bat and body! Full just outside off, and enticing Harris to drive. He's played outside the ball's line this time and it sneaks between his bat and front leg
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball on middle, and nudged off the back foot to the leg side with the straight bat

Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball, but the ball moves away this time. Harris shapes up to cut because of the loose nature of the delivery, but he's been beaten for place. Ball flies over the blade
Chameera to Harris, no run, back of a length on middle, that gets big on Harris. He tiptoes to ride the bounce, and then blocks to the leg side
Chameera to Harris, no run, back of a length on middle, and going over Harris' head as he ducks to this delivery
Lakmal to Khawaja, no run,
Lakmal to Khawaja, no run, length ball, just outside off, and Khawaja has no intention of playing at it. Left alone, Dickwella collects

Lakmal to Khawaja, no run, back of a length outside off, and Khawaja looks to fend off the back foot, but the ball gets big on him. Forced to defend without his eyes on the ball, and it hits the blade's shoulder
Lakmal to Khawaja, no run, full and wide outside off, and left alone once again. Delivery was way too wide, and a slightly aggressive batsman would definitely have pounced onto that
Lakmal to Khawaja, 3 runs, full on off, and he crunches a drive past mid off's right! Chase for Lahiru Kumara, whose commitment ensures the ball doesn't get to the boundary
Lakmal to Harris, 1 no ball, length ball, wide outside off, but seaming inwards wildly. Left alone by Harris, but Lakmal has overstepped
Lakmal to Harris, no run, back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce before blocking off the back foot
Chameera to Khawaja, no run, length ball, just outside off stump, and he shoulders his arms this time

Chameera to Khawaja, no run, just past his outside edge! Length ball angling in and Khawaja looked to defend off the back foot. But the delivery flies past his outside edge, and the batsman will feel lucky that didn't take a feather touch. So close
Chameera to Khawaja, no run, full and wide outside off. This ball's going straight through with the arm, and Khawaja has no trouble in deciding to let it go
Chameera to Khawaja, no run, length ball, just outside off stump, and left alone by Khawaja. Happy to do that all evening, it looks like

Chameera to Khawaja, 1 no ball, full and wide outside off, and Khawaja was tempted to drive. He takes a big stride and even swings his bat towards the ball, but pulls it back at the very last moment. He could've played it, in retrospect, given the bowler has bowled a front-foot no ball
Chameera to Khawaja, no run, length ball, wide outside off and once again he shoulders his arms to any delivery that's not aimed at his stumps
Chameera to Khawaja, no run, length ball on off, and angling further away from over the wicket. Happily lets it go to dickwella
Perera to Harris, no run, length ball on off, and turning away after hitting the deck. Carefully fended off the back foot
Perera to Harris, FOUR runs, length ball, wide outside off, and he rocks back to slash a cut. Played wide of point, and that's four easy runs for Harris
Perera to Harris, no run, length ball on off, and worked off his pads to the leg side
Perera to Harris, no run, full just outside off, flighting this delivery. Defended back to Perera off the front foot
Perera to Harris, no run, full on middle, and nudged towards the leg side this time. Stopped by midwicket
Perera to Harris, no run, length ball, wide outside off and turning away. Mistimes the cut to point on this occasion

Chameera to Khawaja, no run, good length just outside off, but the ball holds it's line. Khawaja keeps his bat in front of his body since it's so close to his stumps, but the ball goes past his blade anyway
Chameera to Khawaja, 2 runs, back of a length on off, and he swivels to pull along the ground. Deep midwicket runs around the boundary to keep it down to only two
Chameera to Khawaja, 1 run, length ball on off, but the ball stays low this time. Khawaja rolls his wrists and whips this away off his pads to square leg
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball, just outside off, and bunted towards cover off the back foot
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball, just outside off stump, and left alone after he drags his bat towards the ball before pulling it back late
Chameera to Harris, 3 runs, length ball, wide outside off, and he tries to pull his bat back. But it hits his blade anyway, and rolls away to deep point for a couple more
Kumara to Harris, no run, length ball on middle, and angling away from Harris. Bunted off the back foot to point
Kumara to Harris, no run, back of a length on middle, and he shapes up to flat-bat a pull. But the shot's been bottom-edged to mid on
Kumara to Harris, no run, nice shape from Kumara. Length ball on middle, and while Harris opts to shoulder his arms, the ball is very close to the top of off stump
Kumara to Harris, no run, length ball, aimed at the stumps, and nudged off his hips to the leg side. Straight to square leg though
Kumara to Harris, no run, length ball on middle, and defended with gentle hands off the back foot. Ball rolls away to mid off
Kumara to Harris, 1 run, back of a length on middle, and firmly punched past the non-striker's right. Mid off needs to race towards long-off, but Chandimal manages to drag it back
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball, just outside off stump, and he misses the cut. Through to the keeper
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball, just outside off stump, and defended back to the bowler off the back foot
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball, wide outside off stump, and he looks to cut again! Misses once more
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball, wide outside off stump, and he shoulders his arms this time
Chameera to Harris, 1 run, length ball on leg stump, and clipped off his pads to square leg. Sub fielder Sadeera slides across the ground to intercept
Chameera to Khawaja, no run, length ball, just outside off stump, and he lets the ball go into the keeper's gloves
Kumara to Harris, no run, length ball, just outside off, and blocked off the back foot to cover
Kumara to Harris, no run, length ball, wide outside off stump, and he bunts this away to point. Tried to get his bat out of the way, but eventually plays a checked shot
Kumara to Harris, no run, back of a length just outside off stump, and he rides the bounce to play a cut shot. Gently steered to point

Kumara to Harris, FOUR runs, full and wide outside off, and he slashes hard at this. Tries to lift a drive over cover, but the ball goes over point instead. Two men chase after it, but the ball wins the race in the end
Kumara to Harris, no run, full and wide outside off stump, and he presses forward towards the ball before eventually shouldering his arms
Kumara to Harris, no run, back of a length on off stump, and he gets under the ball's line and allows it to go to Dickwella
Chameera to Khawaja, no run, full on off, and bunted down the ground to mid off
Chameera to Khawaja, no run, full on off stump, and Khawaja is forced to play at it. Looks to defend, and the outside edge falls short of second slip
Chameera to Khawaja, 1 run, length ball on middle, and he tiptoes before nudging a shot into he gap on the leg side
Chameera to Harris, 2 runs, length ball o off, and he steers this into the gap between gully and point. Three fielders - including the keeper - give the ball a chase
Chameera to Harris, no run, full and wide outside off, and left alone
Chameera to Harris, no run, length ball on leg stump, and clipped away to square leg. They can't pinch a single though
Kumara to Khawaja, FOUR runs, yorker that lands just before off stump, and Khawaja gets his toes out of the way before opening the bat's face fine. Runs this late past the slip cordon's left for four
Kumara to Khawaja, no run, full outside off stump, and he presses forward to defend. But the ball goes past his outside edge
Kumara to Khawaja, no run, length ball, wide outside off, and he shoulders his arms on this occasion. Dickwella collects from near his chest
Kumara to Khawaja, 1 wide, length ball on middle, and the attempted pull goes over his head. Way too high, reckons umpire Erasmus
Kumara to Khawaja, no run, full and wide outside off, and he checks a drive to cover
Kumara to Khawaja, no run, length ball, just outside off stump, and he rides the bounce to block from near his face
Kumara to Khawaja, no run, length ball landing on middle stump, but angling across the batsman's body. Left alone once again
Lakmal to Harris, FOUR runs, length ball, wide outside off, and he laps a cut-shot off the back foot. Played past the diving point fielder, and after that... it's got four written all over it
Lakmal to Harris, no run, length ball on off stump, and he stays on the back foot to block this delivery
Lakmal to Harris, 2 runs, length ball, wide outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
Lakmal to Harris, no run, length ball on off, and angling inwards. Nudged off his pads to the leg side
Lakmal to Harris, no run, full on off, and driven tentatively towards the leg side after stepping forward. Intercepted at midwicket
Lakmal to Harris, no run, length ball, wide outside off stump, and blocked away to the leg side

Perera to Khawaja, OUT, fourth time he gets Khawaja! Chopped on, and Australia lose a second wicket just ten minutes before stumps. Not short enough for the cut, not wide enough for the cut, and the in-drifter is inside-edged right onto Khawaja's stumps. Delight for Sri Lanka
Perera to Lyon, no run, length ball on middle, and padded away to the leg side
Perera to Lyon, no run, full just on off stump, and blocked away to the leg side
Perera to Lyon, no run, tossed up on leg stump, and worked away to the leg side. Square leg intercepts
Perera to Lyon, no run, full outside leg stump, and padded away. Ball pitching outside leg anyway
Perera to Lyon, no run, full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to block
Lakmal to Harris, no run, length ball, wide outside off, and he chooses not to play the cut shot
Lakmal to Harris, no run, full outside off stump, and Harris presses forward before shouldering his arms. Through to Dickwella
Lakmal to Harris, no run, length ball on middle and leg stump. Defended off the back foot to the bowler
Lakmal to Harris, no run,
Lakmal to Harris, no run, length ball, wide outside off, and he allows the delivery to go through to the keeper
Lakmal to Harris, no run, full just outside off, and blocked away to cover
Perera to Lyon, no run, full outside leg stump, and tapped away to midwicket
Perera to Lyon, no run, full on middle, and the front-foot defense is flayed over to cover
Perera to Lyon, no run, full on leg stump, and pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
Perera to Lyon, no run, dropped at short leg! Length ball, outside off and turning inwards. Lyon inside-edges this towards the leg side, but he fielder can't hold on! Roshen the fielder
Perera to Lyon, no run, full just outside off, and defended back to the bowler
Perera to Lyon, no run, no they can't. A length ball, wide outside off, and blocked away to cover off the back foot
Kumara to Harris, no run, good length angled across he fends and misses! Nothing shot just poking from the crease away from his body
Kumara to Harris, no run, good length, tighter to off, he defends with soft hands back down the pitch
Kumara to Harris, no run, 141kph, fuller and wider of off, he pushes on the front foot to mid off
Kumara to Harris, no run, 141kph, fuller outside off, he tries to drives and miscues off the thick inside half of the bat to mid on
Kumara to Harris, FOUR runs, glorious square drive through cover-point! 141kph, wide half-volley and Harris leans into a drive and it makes a beautiful crack off the bat! It races away

Kumara to Harris, OUT, caught at point! Incredibly soft dismissal! Short and wide from Kumara, he just guides a cut shot, rather than hammering it, like catching practice it ballooned waist high to point and straight to the man, Thirimanne. Easy catch
Lakmal to Lyon, no run, beaten by a lovely 126kph, out-swinger, wide of off, he pushes at it and misses
Lakmal to Lyon, no run, 129kph, good length on off, he defends from the crease to mid on
Lakmal to Lyon, no run, 128kph, good length out-swinger on off, he pushes on the front foot to point
Lakmal to Lyon, no run, 129kph, good length, well wide of off, he leaves on the front foot
Lakmal to Lyon, 1 run, 128kph, fuller outside off, he check drives to the gap at cover-point and he's off the mark
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, 131kph, good length out-swinger wide of off, he leaves this alone
Kumara to Lyon, 4 leg byes, full angled down, he tries to glance it comes off pad and runs fine between the keeper and leg slip for four leg byes!
Kumara to Lyon, no run, 145kph, good length angled into off, he defends on the front foot off the inside edge and it squirts behind him to leg slip

Kumara to Lyon, 1 leg bye, hug LBW appeal Not out is the call. Sri Lanka review. Full toss angled into leg, hits him on the base of the back heel, it rolls behind square for a leg bye. No bat involved. Ball tracking has the impact outside leg and going way down leg side. Terrible review.
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 146kph, good length, angling in to off, just straightening, he makes a decisive leave
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, back of a length on off, he defends off the back foot into the on side
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, wide of the crease, 137kph, good length angled in to a fourth stump line, he plays a textbook forward defence
Lakmal to Lyon, no run, beaten by a superb out-swinger! Angled into off and shapes away late past the edge. Not many players would nick that
Lakmal to Lyon, no run, 129kph, good length, fourth stump line, he defends off the outside half of the bat to point
Lakmal to Lyon, no run, fuller outside off, he drives firmly to mid off

Lakmal to Lyon, OUT, caught at second slip! Brilliant catch by Mendis diving forward! The umpires are checking if it carried but it did! Superb cricket. Good length, angling in and shaping away, he presses forward to defend, gets an outside edge with soft hands. It flies low to seocnd slip and Mendis reached forward and got his hands underneath it. Great catch. The third umpire double checked it but it was a clean catch and a really good one
Lakmal to Head, 4 byes, 127kph, bouncer, it really climbs, he ducked very late, it flies way over the keeper's head for four byes!
Lakmal to Head, no run, 127kph, good length well wide of off, he leaves this alone
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 142kph, back of a length wide of off, he raises the bat above his head to let it pass
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, good length, nipping back, he's forward and leaving on length as it's tight to off but just over the top
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 141kph, bouncer, over off, he ducks under it early
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 139kph, back of a length over off, he raises the bat and lets this go on length as it flicks his chest on the way through
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 142kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending

Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, hit on the pad, huge appeal for LBW, not out. It was fuller outside off, nipping back, it hit the front pad but just outside the line of off. Good decision. No review from Sri Lanka
Lakmal to Head, no run, 127kph, good length wide of off, trying to swing back but he's able to leave this through to Dickwella
Lakmal to Head, no run, 129kph, good length, outside off, tailing back, he leaves well again
Lakmal to Head, no run, 129kph, good length tempter way wide of off, he leaves again
Lakmal to Head, no run, fuller length 130kph, but a fifth stump line and he shoulders arms again
Lakmal to Head, no run, 129kph, fuller length, fifth stump line, he plays this time pushing firmly to mid off
Lakmal to Head, no run, 128kph, fuller shaping in, he pushes with the angle on the front foot to mid on
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 141kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot back to the bowler
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 142kph, good length, fifth stump line, he leaves on the front foot confidently
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 140kph, bouncer, it is very high and outside off, he ducks under it easily
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 136kph, back of a length wide of off, he leaves off the back foot through to Dickwella
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 140kph, good length fifth stump line, asking a question, but Labuschagne is happy to leave
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 143kph, fuller outside off, he strides forward and plays a solid forward defence
Lakmal to Head, no run, 132kph, good length angled across, he leaves this alone through to the keeper
Lakmal to Head, no run, 130kph, good length in the channel outside off, he strides out and lets it go again
Lakmal to Head, no run, 129kph, good length slanting in but still wide, he's back and leaving once more

Lakmal to Head, FOUR runs, a hint of width and he late cuts past gully to find the boundary! The pressure is released. It was fractionally short and wide and he got in a great position and snaps the wrists on a late cut!
Lakmal to Head, no run, fuller length, tighter to off, 131kph, he defends from the crease to mid off
Lakmal to Head, no run, he pads up to a late inswinger, it's high, Sri Lanka appeal, but it's not out. Too high. Dangerous leave from Head
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, 131kph, good length wide of off, he leaves this alone
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, 129kph, good length in the channel, sixth stump line, he leaves this alone again
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, 135kph, fuller length closer to off, he presses forward to defend to mid off
Chameera to Labuschagne, 2 runs, angled down leg and he glances this easily behind square to a raucous cheer from the Queensland crowd

Chameera to Labuschagne, 3 leg byes, another appeal for LBW, hit outside the line, not out, it's rolled to slip who fires at the striker's and no one was backing up! Three overthrows! Everyone was looking at the umpire for the decision. Strange from Mendis to throw when Labuschagne had both feet in the crease
Chameera to Head, no run, 135kph, good length wide of off, he's happy to leave again
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, good length wide of off, he leaves alone again
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, beaten by a beauty! This wobbled in, hit the seam and nipped away, he pushed forward to defend and it zipped past the edge
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, 132kph, good length, fifth stump line, he's forward and defending on the front foot
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, 132kph, good length wide of off, he tries to leave but doesn't withdraw the bat late enough, it runs off the face on the bounce into the gully
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, 131kph, good length on middle and leg, he clips this off the front foot to wide mid on
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, very full outside off, 130kph, he squeezes a forward defence to point
Chameera to Head, no run, 138kph, good length angled way wide of off, he is leaving watchfully again
Chameera to Head, no run, 137kph, good length angled into off, he defends on the front foot back to the bowler

Chameera to Head, FOUR runs, edged just high and wide of second slip! He flashed at a wide tempter, feet nowhere, got a thick edge that flew just out of reach of second slip and away to the fine third man rope! Head is furious with himself at that shot.
Chameera to Head, no run, good length outside off, he wisely leaves this alone this time
Chameera to Head, no run, shorter and wider, he chases a cut shot and misses again!
Chameera to Head, no run, good length, angled across and he's able to leave this one
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 138kph, good length wide of off, he leaves easily wide of off
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 142kph, good length, fifth stump line, he leaves this alone once more
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, 140kph, good length angled towards off, he presses forward and defends on the front foot
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, back of a length, angled into off, he defends from the crease back to the bowler
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, short ball, wide of off, he tries to pull but checks the stroke to mid on
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, good length, 138kph, wide of off, he leaves again
Chameera to Head, no run, full, and wide outside off stump. Head steps forward and then shoulders his arms
Chameera to Head, no run, length ball angling in, and he prods forward to block back to Chameera

Chameera to Head, 1 no ball, back of a length outside off, but angling into Head again. He rides the bounce to block towards the leg side. The umpire, however, has put out his right hand for a front-foot no-ball
Chameera to Head, no run, length ball outside off, and holding it's line. Left alone by Head
Chameera to Head, no run, length ball, on off stump, and angling further away. Head covers his offstump and shoulders his arms
Chameera to Head, no run, back of a length on middle stump, and he tiptoes to nudge this away to the leg side. Soft hands on display
Chameera to Head, 1 bye, full on leg stump, but some swing takes the ball further down the leg side. Keeper fumbles too, and that allows Australia to pinch an extra run
Kumara to Head, no run, back of a length on middle, and he rides the bounce to steer a square shot to point
Kumara to Head, 1 run, length ball on leg stump, and that's been worked off his hips to square leg. They scamper across for one
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, length ball, just outside off but skidding inwards. Labuschagne covers his off stump, and then shoulders his arms
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, length ball aimed at Labuschagne's body, and he comfortably fends this off the back foot to mid on

Kumara to Labuschagne, 3 runs, full on leg stump, and clipped beautifully off his pads. Work for the fielder at deep backward square, but he manages to run around the boundary and intercept from near cow corner
Kumara to Head, no run, length ball on middle, and he shuffles across to the off side, before nudging it to square leg off his hips
Chameera to Labuschagne, 1 run, full outside leg stump, and steered fine to the fielder at fine leg for a walking single
Chameera to Head, FOUR runs, full and wide outside off, and he jams his bat down to check-drive a shot through the covers! Races away to the square boundary
Chameera to Head, no run, full and wide outside off, but too wide reckons Head. Doesn't bother chasing it, allowing it instead to find the keeper's gloves
Chameera to Head, no run, length ball on off, and he walks across to the off side, before fending it away off the back foot
Chameera to Head, no run, length ball on middle, and some extra bounce forces Head to tiptoe. Eventually comfortably blocked back to Chameera

Chameera to Head, FOUR runs, full and wide outside off stump, and he slaps a cover drive past mid-off's right. Chase for the fielder, and he dives near the boundary... but did Chandimal make a mess of it near the boundary? He missed the first parry, and on his second attempt, it's his back leg that's touching the rope. Full marks for effort, fail marks for execution
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, length ball just outside off, and turning inwards. Defended off the back foot to Perera
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, full on off, and he takes a big stride forward to block towards short midwicket
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, length ball on middle, and nudged off his pads to square leg
Perera to Labuschagne, 3 runs, tossed up just outside off, and he crunches a drive past Perera's left. Chase for mid off, who manages to pull the ball back well short of the boundary rope
Perera to Head, no run, full on off, and Head gets to the pitch of the ball, before blocking with soft hands
Perera to Head, no run, full, but wide outside off. Spinning away from Head, and he uses the bat to guide a soft shot towards the off side. Drinks
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, length ball, just wide outside off, and he opts to shoulder his arms
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to block with the straight bat. Ball rolls away to mid off
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, full on middle, and tapped off his toes to short midwicket. Gently played, and the ball dribbles into the fielder's hands
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, length ball, wide outside off, and he shoulders his arms
Kumara to Labuschagne, 1 run, full just outside off, and he check-drives to cover for a quick single
Kumara to Head, 1 wide, back of a length on leg stump, and that sends Head ducking, but the umpire thinks it was way too short. Calls it a wide
Kumara to Head, 1 run, length ball on middle stump, and whipped away - off his hips - to deep backward square
Perera to Head, 1 leg bye, full on middle, but drifting down leg. Head manages to get a feather-touch to this, and the ball rolls away to short fine leg
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, length ball on leg stump, and nudged away to square leg
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, full on leg stump, and Labuschagne takes a big stride forward to fend towards the leg side
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, length ball on leg stump, and whipped off the back foot to deep midwicket. Man there
Perera to Head, 1 run, full on off, and he gets inside the ball's line, before driving through the on-side to midwicket
Perera to Labuschagne, 3 runs, length ball on middle, and he backs away to make some room, before punching past the bowler's left. Mid-off gives it a chase
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, length ball, just wide outside off, and flying over off stump as Labuschagne shoulders his arms

Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, big appeal for lbw, but not given! Length ball on off stump that stays low and Labuschagne shoulders his arms expecting the ball to go past his pads, but the ball comes in and hits his front pad. Always dangerous with no shot offered, but it's the extra bounce that saves him
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, full on off, and he opts to use his bat this time. Defended back to Kumara
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, length ball, wide outside off stump, and left alone by Marnus
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, full, just outside off stump, and pushed away to cover with soft hands. They choose not to run
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, full just outside off stump, and he drives through the ball's line, past Kumara's left. But stopped by mid off
Perera to Head, 3 runs, half-tracker outside off stump, and Head prods forward before rocking back. Slaps it through the covers thereafter, and the fielder in the deep must run around the boundary
Perera to Labuschagne, 2 runs, full on off, and he shuffles across the stumps, before paddling an effective sweep to fine leg
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, length ball on off, and turning inwards. Looks to punch, but inside-edged right onto his body
Perera to Labuschagne, FOUR runs, full on middle, and that's been swept hard behind squrare! No stopping that. First 50 partnership of the Test
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, full just outside off stump, and worked off his toes to midwicket
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, full on leg stump, and he taps it to midwicket's right for a quick single. Double-digit over!
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, back of a length just outside off, forcing Marnus to duck swiftly under the line of the ball
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, full just outside off stump, and he presses forward to block with the bat's straight face
Kumara to Labuschagne, no run, length ball, wide outside off stump, and cut square to the fielder at point. Stopped by Roshen
Kumara to Labuschagne, 1 run, length ball, just outside off stump, and he defends off the back foot. Ball takes the outside edge and rolls down to third man for one
Kumara to Head, no run, length ball on middle, and he tiptoes to defend off the back foot. Soft hands ensure the ball falls near his toes
Kumara to Head, 1 run, length ball outside off, and moving slightly away too. Head sticks his bat out and manages to steer a fine shot to third man, past gully
Perera to Head, 1 run, full just outside off, and tapped away from his body to cover for a single
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, full on middle, and he shovels a straight drive down to long on for one
Perera to Head, no run, length ball just outside off, and he presses forward to block to the bowler
Perera to Head, no run, full outside off, and he skips down the wicket to drive. Mistimed to cover
Perera to Head, no run, full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
Perera to Head, no run,
Lakmal to Labuschagne, 1 no ball, full on middle, and he covers his off stump, before defending to mid on. But Lakmal's overstepped again. The fourth of the Test for Sri Lanka

Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, length ball just outside off stump, and Marnus covers his off stump before shouldering his arms. Some late movement into the batsman as it whizzes over the top of off stump
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, full outside off, and jagging away from Marnus this time. He gets to the pitch of the ball, before opting to let it go
Lakmal to Labuschagne, 3 runs, full on off, and he drives through the leg side. Kumara - at midwicket - gives the ball a chase, and manages to pull it back
Lakmal to Head, 3 runs, full on middle, and the clip off his pads past midwicket gives Australia the lead!
Lakmal to Labuschagne, 1 run, full just outside off, and he taps to cover with soft hands for a quick single.
Lakmal to Head, no run, length ball outside off, but too close to his body for the cut. Spliced to point
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, off break outside off, 84kph, he presses forward and defends back to the bowler
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, full on middle, he drives firmly back to the bowler
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, tossed up, he skips out and drives nicely straight of mid off, Lakmal makes a diving stop but they run one as it bounces off his hand towards mid on
Perera to Head, no run, fuller on off, he pushes slowly back to the bowler
Perera to Head, 2 runs, drifting down leg, he paddle sweeps fine of short fine leg with control, they get a couple
Perera to Head, no run, looped up on off, 81kph, he skips down to the pitch and defends
de Silva to Labuschagne, no run, off break, on leg, he is taken on the pad and it rolls away
de Silva to Labuschagne, 1 run, shorter on leg, he's back and tucking this past short leg for a single
de Silva to Head, no run, beaten! 83kph, outside off, a hint of turn away, he prods at it and misses on the front foot
de Silva to Head, no run, shorter length, he is back and punching back to the bowler
de Silva to Head, no run, pushed through, 84kph, on off, he's back and defending
de Silva to Head, no run, 93kph, fired fast wide of off, he leaves this alone
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, shorter wide of off, he's back and cutting straight to backward point

Perera to Labuschagne, FOUR runs, he sweeps firmly past short fine and away to the rope! This was full on leg, he hammers this firmly behind square and past the man defending one and he gets a boundary
Perera to Labuschagne, 2 runs, shorter length, he's back and punching neatly through cover, good stroke to pick up two more
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, shorter on leg, he turns this past leg slip and short fine is deeper now so they pinch a single
Perera to Head, no run, quicker and flatter on off, 83kph, he defends from the crease with firm hands
Perera to Head, no run, tossed up and turning away, he leaves this alone outside off
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, 127kph, good length and a lot of swing, it shapes well wide of off and is left alone
Lakmal to Labuschagne, 3 runs, 129kph, full and swinging away, he leans out and plays a quality cover drive placing this past cover, it doesn't go all the way as the outfield is a touch slow

Lakmal to Head, 1 run, dropped by Dickwella! Superb delivery not rewarded! Good length, angling in and seaming away a touch, he is squared up defending, gets a healthy edge, Dickwella dives late and full stretch to his left and drops it with the one hand!
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, good length wide of off he leaves
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, back of a length wide of off, he leaves this alone again
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, good length wide of off, he shoulders arms
Perera to Head, no run, tossed up, 85kph, on off, he defends on the front foot
Perera to Head, no run, 84kph, good length, on off, he stretches out to defend
Perera to Head, no run, fuller and pushed through outside off, he is striding out to defend
Perera to Head, no run, drifting into off, he goes back to a fuller length to defend
Perera to Head, no run, shorter length, wide of off, he cuts firmly straight to cover-point
Perera to Head, no run, fuller on off, he pushes firmly back to the bowler
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, good length, wide of off, he is happy to leave
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, 132kph, fuller out-swinger, he is leaving on the front foot this time
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, 132kph, fuller out-swinger again, nice shape but too wide and he leaves once more
Lakmal to Labuschagne, 1 run, 133kph, fuller on middle and leg, no swing, he pushes neatly wide of mid on and goes with the stroke for a single
Lakmal to Head, no run, back of a length, angled into off, he defends from the crease
Lakmal to Head, no run, 129kph, fuller and hinting to shape in, he pushes off the thick inside half of the bat to square leg
Perera to Labuschagne, 3 runs, shorter outside off, he's back decisively and giving room to punch very well through the gap at cover for another three
Perera to Head, no run, 84kph, good length and a bit of turn on off, he's back and defending to short leg
Perera to Head, 3 runs, advances to the pitch and drives nicely straight of mid on, well timed, long chase for Lakmal and he just hauls it in
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, shorter on the hip, he pulls easily past leg slip to the man at deep backward square
Perera to Head, no run, shorter outside off, he cuts hard to backward point and Chameera makes an outstanding diving save to prevent runs
Perera to Head, no run, tossed up, he skips out and defends with bat and pad together. There's an ambitious appeal for LBW that doesn't warrant any acknowledgement from the umpire
Lakmal to Labuschagne, no run, good length wide of off, he's not interesting in playing and lets it go
Lakmal to Labuschagne, 1 run, good length angled into leg stump, he clips this easily on the front foot to the gap at midwicket for a single
Lakmal to Head, no run, good length, angled into off, he defends on the front foot

Lakmal to Head, FOUR runs, cracking drive punched straight of mid off! The man was quite wide. It was over-pitched and he just punched this through the line and timed it beautifully to beat the diving Chameera
Lakmal to Head, no run, back of a length on off, he's back and defending towards midwicket
Lakmal to Head, no run, good length, fourth stump line, he shuffles back and across and defends, dead batting it into the off side
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, full pitching outside leg, he sweeps easily to deep backward square
Perera to Head, no run, shorter outside off, he's back and punching firmly to cover
Perera to Head, no run, tossed up, 84kph, he skips out and defends back to the bowler
Perera to Head, no run, fuller, drifting in, he reaches out and defends on the front foot
Perera to Head, 1 run, shorter length, he's back and punching to mid off who is quite deep and they get a quick single without much risk
Perera to Labuschagne, 2 runs, full outside leg stump again, he sweeps finer this time and they get two as the man comes around
Chameera to Head, no run, angled in towards off, he gets a little inside edge onto the inside thigh
Chameera to Head, no run, 131kph, good length fifth stump line, he defends off the back foot to mid off
Chameera to Head, FOUR runs, short and wide and he places a cut shot behind point! Well controlled and placed it perfectly! 100 partnership up for these two
Chameera to Head, no run, fuller outside off, he drives firmly back to the bowler

Chameera to Head, 3 runs, fuller outside off, he flicks the hands through a square drive on the front foot and picks th gap forward of point! It goes all the way to the rope, Kumara never gives up and the chase but he might be touching the rope with his leg as he pulled it back. No. He's done well. Another three
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, good length outside off, he tries to drive on the up but mistimes to mid off
Perera to Head, 1 run, fuller on middle, he turns this against the spin on the front foot to the gap at midwicket

Perera to Labuschagne, FOUR runs, shorter on off, he backs away and cuts firmly through cover-point and times this well enough to reach the rope! A maiden Test 50 for Labuschagne. Warm applause from his home crowd
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, off break darted into leg, he tries to sweep, is hit on the pad but it's sliding down
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, tossed up outside off, he pushes firmly back to the bowler
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, he sweeps this from off middle, plays it well to the man at deep backward square
Perera to Head, no run, tossed up on off, he skips down and pushes back to the bowler
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, back of a length, 136kph on off, he defends standing tall on the crease line
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, 136kph, good length on the top of off, he defends on the front foot to mid on
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, wide of the crease, angled into middle and off, he clips this to midwicket
Chameera to Labuschagne, 1 run, 137kph, short ball outside off, he mistimes it in the air but it lands well short of the man in the deep. Wasn't in total control there
Chameera to Head, 1 run, back of a length, 136kph, outside off, he punches off the back foot wide of mid off
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, 137kph, bouncer, he sways under it easily
de Silva to Head, no run, tossed up, on off, he reaches out and defends to short leg
de Silva to Head, no run, shorter length on off, he stands up and defends on the back foot
de Silva to Head, no run, quicker and some turn, Head jabs at it and gets a thick edge that runs to backward point
de Silva to Head, no run, tossed up wider and slower, he leaves this alone
de Silva to Head, no run, 85kph, good length on off, he's back and punching back to the bowler
de Silva to Head, no run, he skips down to a fuller ball and gets an inside edge onto pad
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, good length wide of off, he pushes off the back foot to point
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, back of a length, wide of off, it rears from a length and beats the outside edge as he is squared up!
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, 132kph, back of a length on off, he defends from the back foot
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, 135kph, bouncer, outside off, he sways under it very easily
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, 136kph, good length, hint of seam away, he gets a thick outside edge poking forward that flies to point
Chameera to Labuschagne, no run, back of a length on middle and off, he turns this to square leg
de Silva to Head, no run, full just outside off stump, and defended
de Silva to Head, no run, full outside off, and turning away. He looks to drive, but mistimes to mid off
de Silva to Head, no run, full on off, but he skips down the wicket to convert it into a full toss. Splices a shot to mid off again
de Silva to Head, no run, length ball, teasing outside off, and Head allows it to go into the keeper's gloves
de Silva to Head, no run, full just outside off, and driven down the ground to mid-on this time
de Silva to Head, no run, third maiden in a row! Length ball on off, and he punches uncomfortably to mid-on
Chameera to Labuschagne, 1 leg bye, length ball on middle, and going down leg. Manages to get a feather-touch off his body as the ball dribbles down to fine leg
Chameera to Head, no run, length ball on middle, and worked off his pads - off the back foot - to midwicket. Finds the fielder
Chameera to Head, no run, length ball on middle, and he allows the ball to get to him, before defending from under his nose. Ball rolls back to Chameera
Chameera to Head, 1 run, length ball on middle, and he bunts a back-foot punch to cover for a quick single. Moves on to 48
Chameera to Labuschagne, 1 run, back of a length, slower ball on off stump. He allows the ball to get to him, before nudging it to the leg side with soft hands for a quick single
Chameera to Head, 1 run, length ball on off, and clipped off his pads to the vacant midwicket region. Head on 49
de Silva to Head, no run, length ball outside off, but snaking inwards. Head backs away, and mistimes a muscled shot to cover
de Silva to Head, no run, full just outside of, and he skips down the ground to drive straight. Excellent effort from the bowler - diving to his right - to stop a certain single (or more)
de Silva to Head, no run, full just outside off, and he reaches forward to block towards the off side
de Silva to Head, 1 run, length ball, wide outside off, and sliced off the back foot to cover. Misfield from the fielder, and that's fifty for Travis Head!
de Silva to Labuschagne, no run, overpitched on middle, and he shovels a mistimed drive to mid-off
de Silva to Labuschagne, 1 run, full on middle, and worked off his pads to the vacant region near deep midwicket
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, length ball on middle, but going down leg. Labuschagne tries to paddle this fine, and misses. But so does Dickwella
Perera to Labuschagne, 2 runs, full outside off, and he exposes all three stumps by shuffling across the wicket, before paddling a sweep fine down the leg side
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, full just outside off stump, and the attempted nudge towards the leg side is bat-padded towards short leg instead
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, full on off, and the skidder is check-punched down the ground to mid-on
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, full just outside off, and confidently driven straight past the bowler's right to long on. They walk across for one
Perera to Head, no run, full, wide outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to fend it away to cover

de Silva to Labuschagne, 3 runs, tossed up on leg stump, and that's an inside-out cover drive that pierces the off-side field. Slides through cover and mid-off, and collects a couple more for his team
de Silva to Head, no run, full just outside off, but he walks down the ground to pad this away to cover
de Silva to Head, 3 runs, full outside off stump, and he throws his hands at this. Smashes a shot straight past the bowler's left, and mid-on must give the ball a mighty chase
de Silva to Labuschagne, no run, length ball outside leg stump, and angling into his hips. Nudged gently off the front foot to the leg side
de Silva to Labuschagne, 1 run, tossed up outside leg stump, and easily paddled fine to Chameera manning the backward-square boundary
de Silva to Head, no run, length ball outside off, and turning further away. Head backs away to cut, but finds the fielder at cover point
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, full, outside off, and no real turn. Comfortably blocked off the front foot
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, full on off, and he drives with the offbreak. Beats the bowler, past his right, and goes down to mid-on for one
Perera to Head, no run, full on middle, and he wedges a front-foot drive back to the bowler. Too low on the bat, no power off that shot

Perera to Head, 1 run, full outside off, and he wedges another cover drive. But the ball goes through the fielder's legs and that allows Head to rotate the strike. Bad bounce just before the ball reached Chandimal there
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, full outside off, and turning inwards. Driven through mid-on for a single
Perera to Head, no run, full just outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
de Silva to Labuschagne, 1 run, full on leg stump, and tapped with soft hands to the leg side for a quick single
de Silva to Head, no run, full on off, and he walks down the ground, before defending back to Dananjaya
de Silva to Head, no run, full just outside off, and he reaches forward to defend
de Silva to Head, FOUR runs, length ball on middle, and extra bounce gets big on Head. But he backs away to make some room, and then absolutely flat-bats a pull through deep midwicket
de Silva to Head, no run, full on middle, but he's skipped down the ground to meet it. Bat-padded before scampering back into the crease
de Silva to Head, no run, length ball on middle, but coming into Head. No room to work with, and he mistimes a straight-batted punch to the bowler
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, length ball just outside off, and turning into Labuschagne. Punched off the back foot to mid on
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, full just outside off, and worked with the spin - off his pads - to midwicket. Nice call early for a single
Perera to Head, no run, length ball, from round the wicket, and turning away from Head. Makes room to cut, but slaps it straight to point
Perera to Head, no run, full outside off, and he skips down the ground to punch a drive. Finds cover
Perera to Head, no run, full, tossed up outside off, and Head reaches the ball with a big stride to defend
Perera to Head, no run, full on off, and he drives inside the ball's line. Wedged back to the bowler though. Another drinks break
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, no run, quicker ball first up after the drinks break. Length ball outside off, and skidding right into Dickwella's gloves
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, no run, length ball, wide outside off, and he splices a cut to point
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, no run, length ball just outside off, and he stays on the back foot to defend
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, no run, almost a medium-pacer's delivery there. Full just outside off, and defended towards the leg side
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, 2 runs, length ball, just wide outside off, and he steers a cut-shot past the fielder at point. Enough time to jog back for the second
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, no run, length ball, wide outside off stump again. Rides the bounce to punch through to cover
Perera to Head, no run, short outside off, and turning further away. Head looks to put it away, but the cut is intercepted at cover
Perera to Head, no run, full on middle, and he comes down the ground to drill a drive. Straight to mid-on though
Perera to Head, no run, full on middle, and clipped off his toes to the leg side. Midwicket cleans up
Perera to Head, no run, full outside off, and he skips down the ground to crunch another cover drive. Chandimal dives to his left to stop
Perera to Head, no run, full outside off again, and once more driven through the off side. Chandimal stops it once again

Perera to Head, 1 leg bye, full and wide outside off, and Head comes down the wicket to drive. But he sees the quicker ball, and tries to pad it away, but all he can do is bat-pad it towards the off side. He's lucky that the ball didn't go straight into silly mid-off's hands
Karunaratne to Head, no run, length ball on middle, and not allowing Head to free his arms. Punched back to Karunaratne
Karunaratne to Head, no run, full just outside off stump, and he meets the ball on the front foot to drive. Played to mid-on

Karunaratne to Head, FOUR runs, length ball on leg stump, and clipped fine off his pads! Chameera looks to cut it off at fine leg, but he fluffs it in the end. Ball rolls into the rope despite the fielder getting a hand to it
Karunaratne to Head, no run, length ball on middle, and angling away from Head. Punched off the back foot to mid-off
Karunaratne to Head, FOUR runs, beats point! Length ball on off, and with the ball moving away... it allows Head to free his arms. Slapped behind square for four more
Karunaratne to Head, no run, length ball on off, but too close to his body for the cut. Mistimed towards the off side
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, length ball on middle, and worked off the back foot to the vacant square-leg region. Single brings up their 150-run stand
Perera to Head, 1 run, full on off, and he drills it to Sadeera - the 12th man - to mid off. Misfield, however, allows them to take the single
Perera to Labuschagne, no run, length ball, wide outside off, but turning inwards. Nudged away to the leg side

Perera to Labuschagne, no run, big appeal for lbw but not given! Perera goes full on off, but is it turning in too much? Sri Lanka review anyway. The ball lands on off, and hist his front pad on middle and leg. Two questions remain: 1) whether it's too high, or 2) whether it's missing leg stump... and yes, it's both high and wide. Sri Lanka lose their last review
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, length ball, just wide outside off stump, and he steers a back-foot punch to the vacant point region
Perera to Head, no run, length ball, wide outside off, and cut off the back foot to point once more
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, no run, length ball on off, and seaming away after hitting the deck. Marnus looks to defend, but he's surprised by the ball's movement. Goes through to the keeper
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, no run, full on off, and he meets the ball on the front foot for a drive. Played to mid on
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, no run, big appeal for lbw again! But umpire Erasmus says no. Full on off, and angling into his pads, but Labuschagne had inside-edged the attemptee drive onto his pads
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, 1 run, width offered, and cut to deep point
Karunaratne to Head, 1 run, length ball, just outside off, and cut off the back foot to deep point
Karunaratne to Labuschagne, 2 runs, length ball, wide enough for Marnus to cut square. Slapped to deep extra cover for two more
Perera to Head, no run, length ball, wide outside off, and he allows the ball to go through to the keeper
Perera to Head, 2 runs, full on middle, and he walks down the ground, before nudging it past midwicket for a couple more
Perera to Head, no run, full just outside off, and the attempted defensive shot takes an inside edge towards leg slip! Could've easily played on there
Perera to Head, no run, full just outside off, and driven away from his body, with the bat's open face to cover point
Perera to Head, no run, width offered outside off, and he makes room to cut. Finds point though
Perera to Head, no run, full on off, and he walks down the wicket to defend back to silly mid-off
de Silva to Labuschagne, 1 run, low full toss on off stump, and he carefully drives this straight past the bowler's right to wide long on
de Silva to Head, 1 run, length ball just outside off. Turning into the left-hander, but he manages to muscle a punch down to long off

de Silva to Labuschagne, no run, back of a length on middle, and the bounce gets big on Labuschagne. But carefully negated to the leg side... choosing to flick with soft hands to keep the ball along the ground

de Silva to Labuschagne, 4 runs, length ball on leg, and going across the right hander. Marnus backs away, rocks deep into his crease, and crunches a cut in front of square through cover. They run four!
de Silva to Labuschagne, 1 run, full on middle, and he drives with the bat's open face to cover
de Silva to Head, no run, length ball on middle, and skidding through. Clipped to midwicket
Perera to Labuschagne, 1 run, full on leg stump, and swept to fine leg for a walking single
Perera to Head, no run, length ball on off, and turning into his body. Defended

Perera to Head, no run, Dickwella appeals for caught behind but umpire says 'no'! Sri Lanka don't have any reviews either. Was a length ball outside off that Head tried to steer late down third man. He missed, and Dickwella ensured he appealed with all his heart. No mark on the hotspot either, replays suggest
Perera to Head, no run, length ball just outside off, and cut to cover
Perera to Head, no run,
Perera to Head, no run, full on middle, and he skips down the ground for a leg-side whip. Hit well, but finds the fielder at midwicket

de Silva to Labuschagne, OUT, caught at short mid on! Full on off, and Marnus skips down the wicket to lift a drive over the lurking fielder. But it's come off the bat's bottom-half, and the fielder under the helmet - Thirimanne - jumps to his right to take a solid catch. Labuschagne falls after scoring Australia's highest Test score this summer
de Silva to Patterson, no run, full just outside off, and the tall man takes a big stride forward to defend
de Silva to Patterson, no run, full on middle, and angling into his pads. Patterson walks inside the ball's line, and defends towards the leg side
de Silva to Patterson, no run, full and wide outside off, hoping the batsman would take the bait. Patterson chooses to shoulder his arms instead
de Silva to Patterson, no run, full on middle, and he shovels a drive back to Dananjaya
de Silva to Patterson, no run, full outside off, and false shot from Patterson. Tries to drive through cover, but it comes off the bat's inside half. Ball rolls away to the leg side
Perera to Head, no run, length ball on the fourth-stump line, but angling into Head. Punched off the back foot to cover
Perera to Head, no run, tossed up, full outside off stump. Defended with soft hands
Perera to Head, no run, full on off, and the ball skids through. Defended off the back foot this time
Perera to Head, no run,
Perera to Head, no run, full on off, and he skips down the ground to drive. Hit straight back to Perera
Perera to Head, no run, full just outside off stump, and defended off the front foot. Maiden
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, length ball outside off, and left alone by the left-handed Patterson
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, length ball on middle, and Patterson rides the bounce before firmly defending off the back foot
Lakmal to Patterson, 1 leg bye, full on leg stump, and he gently nudges this fine down the leg side. The crowd roars as they think Pattinson's scored his first Test runs... but alas, it's leg byes!
Lakmal to Head, no run, full and wide outside off, but a big boomerang swing right into Head. He shoulders his arms, and he's lucky that the ball didn't clip off stump
Lakmal to Head, no run, length ball outside off, and coming in sharply. Head pulls his bat back, and allows the delivery to go over the stumps and into Dickwella's gloves
Lakmal to Head, no run, full on middle, and driven with the inswing to the leg side. Time for dinner!
Perera to Patterson, no run, 84kph, pushed through skidding on, he's back and defending
Perera to Patterson, no run, 82kph, slower, shorter a bit of spin, he's back and defending
Perera to Patterson, no run, beaten by a slower off break that lured him forward and rips past the outside edge!
Perera to Patterson, no run, 84kph, drifting in, wide of off, he leaves and it skids straight on but it was wide of off
Perera to Patterson, no run, fuller on off, he's forward defending with uncertainty, inside edge onto pad and it drops down
Perera to Patterson, 1 run, he skips down and drives against the turn to mid on and goes with the stroke to get off the mark in Test cricket
Chameera to Patterson, no run, 131kph, good length, angled across wide of off, he leaves alone
Chameera to Patterson, no run, 129kph, fuller and shaping back into the left-hander, he defends firmly with the full face back to the bowler

Chameera to Patterson, 3 runs, he clips this in air off the hip but forward of square leg, well timed and they get three as it runs towards the rope. It was a gift on the hip but he did square leg a look at it by hitting it in the air
Chameera to Head, no run, shorter length on leg, he defends to midwicket
Chameera to Head, no run, back of a length, shaping into off, 128kph, he stands tall on the back foot and defends
Chameera to Head, no run, good length, 128kph, hint of shape in, but it's wide of off and he leaves watching it go past
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, back of a length on off, shaping back in, he is defending off the back foot back to the bowler
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, shorter on the hip, he clips this easily to square leg
Lakmal to Patterson, 3 runs, 126kph, back of a length outside off, he punches beautifully off the back foot through cover, Head runs well to call Patterson back for three
Lakmal to Head, no run, shorter length, 128kph, swinging well down the leg side
Lakmal to Head, no run, back of a length on off, he defends from the crease back to the bowler
Lakmal to Head, no run, good length wide of off, shaping back but not far enough to tempt Head to play
Chameera to Patterson, 1 run, 128kph, swinging into leg stumps, he tucks this off the pads wide of mid on
Chameera to Head, 1 run, 125kph, back of a length outside off, he punches off the back foot to the gap at cover for a single
Chameera to Patterson, no run, 131kph, good length swinging into off, he defends half-forward on the front foot
Chameera to Patterson, no run, flash and miss at a 127kph, back of a length ball that angles away from the left hander. He tried to back foot drive it square
Chameera to Patterson, no run, good length, 129kph, wide of off and he wisely leaves this alone
Chameera to Patterson, no run, 127kph, good length but swinging down the leg side, he misses out on the leg glance here
Lakmal to Head, 3 runs, shorter outside off, he punches this off the back foot powerfully through cover-point for yet another three
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, back of a length, nipping back in and catches him on the back thigh
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, back of a length outside off, he's back and defending into the off side
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, 126kph, good length on off, he defends half forward from the crease
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, good length, fourth stump line, he leaves this on line and length
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, 131kph, good length on off, he is squared up defending to cover
Perera to Head, no run, pushed through on off, 82kph, he's back and working to midwicket
Perera to Head, no run, floated up outside off, 82kph, he reaches out and defends without conviction
Perera to Head, 1 run, drifting into leg, he is back and working this to the gap at square leg
Perera to Patterson, no run, 83kph, drifting into leg, he defends on the front foot past short leg
Perera to Patterson, no run, tossed up high outside off, he drives elegantly but can't beat cover
Perera to Patterson, no run, drifting into leg, he's back and working this behind square but straight to the fielder
Lakmal to Head, no run, 130kph, shorter and wider, he cuts firmly straight to point
Lakmal to Head, no run, 131kph good length shaping into off, he defends on the front foot to point
Lakmal to Head, no run, 132kph, good length, swinging into the thigh pad, he misses out on a scoring chance
Lakmal to Head, no run, 130kph, fuller swinging into off, he clips this with the swing to mid on
Lakmal to Head, no run, another one swinging way down leg, Dickwella has to dive to knock it down
Lakmal to Head, FOUR runs, glorious back foot drive through cover-point! There was width offered and he whipped the hands through it, and picked the gap at cover-point and it raced away
Perera to Patterson, 1 run, skips down the track and works this wide of mid on for one
Perera to Head, no run, advances to the pitch and drives firmly to mid on
Perera to Head, no run, 85kph, tossed up wide of off, he leaves this alone
Perera to Head, no run, looped up outside off, he skips out and drives to cover
Perera to Head, no run, slower and higher on off, he reaches out and defends on the front foot
Perera to Head, 2 runs, shorter and wider, he cuts firmly through point and picks up three more
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, 131kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot back down the track
Lakmal to Patterson, 1 leg bye, 129kph, shorter on the thigh guard, he can't tuck this off the thigh, it runs away for a leg bye
Lakmal to Head, 2 runs, 128kph, back of a length outside off, he pushes off the back foot slowly to deep point and the man in the deep is slow to come in, Head calls Patterson back for an easy two
Lakmal to Head, no run, 130kph, shorter outside off, he pulls but straight to mid on

Lakmal to Head, OUT, Given LBW! Head reviews immediately. It was full and shaping back down the line of middle, he shuffled across the crease and tried to whip through the leg side. No bat involved. It hit him plumb infront of middle and was hitting the top of middle! Head thought height was an issue. Ball tracking said 'umpire's call'. Australia keep the review. But Head goes.

Lakmal to Paine, OUT, caught at second slip! Brilliant bowling! Incredible catching from Mendis! He's on a hat-trick! This was a cracker from Lakmal. Good length, angled in, swinging away late, Paine fended at it as it bounced away, squared up completely, it went low to Mendis and he dove forward again and snaffled it just above the turf getting his hands under it! Amazing catch.
Perera to Patterson, no run, drifting into off, 84kph, he reaches forward and defends on the front foot
Perera to Patterson, no run, pushed through of off, he defends from the crease
Perera to Patterson, no run, 84kph, drifting in and sliding on, he's back and jamming the bat down
Perera to Patterson, no run, 84kph, fired into off, he is back staying leg side and defending into the off side
Perera to Patterson, no run, he skips down and whips to midwicket
Perera to Patterson, no run, slower on off, 82kph, he reaches away from the body and defends
Lakmal to Cummins, no run, short and way wide of off! Too wide and he leaves this alone easily
Lakmal to Cummins, no run, beaten! Squared up by a beauty! This was angled in and shaping a way a touch back of a length. He was beaten all ends up
Lakmal to Cummins, no run, flash and miss on the drive! They appeal for caught behind but it's not out. He hit his back pad
Lakmal to Cummins, no run, 132kph, full out-swinger wide of off, he leaves this easily
Lakmal to Cummins, no run, good length out-swinger, tempter wide of off, he leaves this alone
Lakmal to Cummins, no run, 132kph, angled into off stump, no swing, he defends on the front foot
Perera to Patterson, no run, good length, it spins and he's squared up, it runs off the outside edge towards point
Perera to Patterson, 1 run, he skips down, doesn't get to the pitch, gets a thick inside edge just past short leg and gets a single
Perera to Cummins, no run, good length on off, not much turn, he defends from the crease
Perera to Cummins, no run, shorter off break, he defends off the back foot towards mid on
Perera to Cummins, no run, fuller and spinning in, he gets a thick inside edge just short of the man at bat pad on the on side
Perera to Cummins, no run, very full, half-volley, he gently pushes this to cover
Chameera to Patterson, no run, 130kph, back of a length shaping into off, he defends off the back foot
Chameera to Patterson, no run, good length, 124kph, on middle, he defends from the crease
Chameera to Patterson, no run, 126kph, very full, pushed across the left-hander and he leaves
Chameera to Patterson, 1 run, good length on odd, he defends to the gap at cover and they take a single
Chameera to Cummins, no run, 129kph, good length out-swinger, he is happy to leave this alone
Chameera to Cummins, no run, beaten by a lovely out-swinger. Good length shaping away and he defends down the wrong line and misses
Perera to Patterson, no run, he skips down and tries to whip against sharp turn, lucky it hit the back pad and bounced away
Perera to Patterson, no run, good length on middle, he defends from the crease
Perera to Patterson, no run, advances again and whips against the turn to midwicket
Perera to Patterson, no run, tossed up, he drives firmly to cover
Perera to Patterson, no run, fuller on middle and leg, he defends solidly on the front foot
Perera to Patterson, no run, sharp spinning off break, wide of off, he shapes to cut but it spins too wide
Chameera to Cummins, no run, length ball just outside off, but nipping back. Hits him above the knee roll, so ball's definitely too high
Chameera to Cummins, no run, length ball, just wide outside off. Jagging further away after hitting the deck, and Cummins leaves it alone
Chameera to Cummins, no run, length ball outside off, and seaming away thereafter. Cummins is happy to let it go for his 15th dot ball
Chameera to Cummins, no run, full just outside off, and moving away once more. Cummins gets to the pitch of the ball, but then lets it go
Chameera to Cummins, no run, full just outside off again, and the out-seamer is left alone by Cummins
Chameera to Cummins, no run, full just outside off, and he lets it go to the keeper once again. Safe batting under the lights from Australia's *cough cough* number 9
Perera to Patterson, no run, length ball, wide outside off, and he stands tall to slap a cut to point
Perera to Patterson, 1 leg bye, full on leg stump, and he goes down on one knee to slog-sweep. Hits his back leg, and rolls away to short fine-leg instead

Perera to Cummins, 1 bye, sharp turn! Length ball on middle, and spinning down leg. Cummins gets his hips out of the ball's way and Dickwella can't hold on to it either. Takes a run to get off strike, but still not off his bat
Perera to Patterson, no run, full just outside off stump, and confidently blocked away to the off side
Perera to Patterson, no run, full outside off stump once again. Big stride from the tall man, before blocking towards short cover
Perera to Patterson, 1 run, full on middle, and he whips a shot away to midwicket. Not well-timed, but played into the gap
Chameera to Patterson, no run, length ball, wide outside off but angling in from round the wicket. Left alone
Chameera to Patterson, no run, length ball, on off stump, and punched off the back foot to cover
Chameera to Patterson, 1 run, pushed off his hips to midwicket for a quick single
Chameera to Cummins, no run, length ball, just wide outside off, and Cummins goes for a back-foot drive through the covers. Too late into the shot, the ball beating him even before his bat-swing

Chameera to Cummins, OUT, what a beauty! Cummins out for a duck. Length ball on off stump, and the ball just about moves away after hitting the pitch. Cummins tries to block towards mid-on, but the ball takes his outside edge and finds Dickwella's gloves. Completely squared him up there
Chameera to Starc, FOUR runs, crunched! Full outside off, and Starc shows no half-measures. Clears his front leg, and clatters a drive through the covers
Perera to Patterson, 2 runs, length ball, wide outside off, and he makes room before playing a delicate cut-shot through the infield. Chase for the man from cover
Perera to Patterson, no run, length ball outside off, but angling in with the arm. Patterson walks down the wicket before padding it away to the off side
Perera to Patterson, no run, length ball, just outside off, and steered off the back foot to point
Perera to Patterson, no run, full on middle stump, and driven right back to the bowler
Perera to Patterson, 1 run, length ball, just outside off, and punched off the back foot to Karunaratne at deep extra cover

Perera to Starc, 2 runs, length ball on middle, and nudged off his pads to the vacant midwicket region. Fielder from square leg runs in to intercept, but enough time for Patterson to come back for the second
Chameera to Patterson, FOUR runs, length ball on off, and he rides the bounce to muscle a pull behind square! No protection there, and the ball runs away to the boundary
Chameera to Patterson, FOUR runs, length ball, wide outside off, and slapped through to the extra-cover boundary! Using the width brilliantly, and letting his bat do the talking
Chameera to Patterson, 1 no ball, full ball just outside off, and he punches down the ground to mid-off. Intercepted inside the circle
Chameera to Patterson, 1 run, length ball angling in from round the wicket, and tapped away - off his hips - to the leg side for a jogging single
Chameera to Starc, 1 run, back of a length on off, and the short ball is uncomfortably defended form near his face. Ball hits the side of his bat and rolls away to the leg side for a quick single
Chameera to Patterson, no run, length ball, wide outside off, and slapped off the back foot to cover point
Chameera to Patterson, FOUR runs, length ball, wide outside off, and he hammers a boundary through the covers once more! Shot, staying on the back foot and allowing his fast hands do all the damage
Perera to Starc, no run, length ball, just outside off, and defended off the back foot
Perera to Starc, no run, full on off, and defended back towards the non-striker off the front foot
Perera to Starc, no run, quicker ball, full on middle and angled into his pads. Clipped to square leg off the back foot
Perera to Starc, no run, length ball on off stump, and punched off the back foot to mid off
Perera to Starc, no run, full on leg stump. Starc says on the back foot, and smothers the turn with a punch towards mid-on
Perera to Starc, no run, length ball on middle, angling into his body. Worked off his hips to the fielder at square leg
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, length ball, just outside off, and fended away off the back foot towards the leg side
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, full on off stump, and the ball angles further away. Patterson shoulders his arms, after covering his stumps
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, length ball, just outside off, and angling further away. Left alone
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, full just outside off stump, and driven through the off side to mid off
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, length ball on middle, and he prods forward to defend off the front foot
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, full on off, and he happily lets the ball go into Dickwella's gloves
Perera to Starc, no run, full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
Perera to Starc, no run, full just outside off stump again, and blocked away towards cover
Perera to Starc, no run, full outside off, but turning away on this occasion. Fended off the back foot with the bat's open face... to point
Perera to Starc, no run, full on leg stump, and nudged away past the lurking short-leg fielder
Perera to Starc, no run, full just outside off, and forces Starc to come forward to defend. Ball sneaks just past his outside edge, and Dickwella whips the bails off. Out? Nah
Perera to Starc, no run, tossed up outside off, and Starc leans forward to crunch a straight drive. Mistimed back to the bowler
Lakmal to Patterson, no run, length ball, just outside off, and he shoulders his arms to let the ball go to the keeper
Lakmal to Patterson, 1 run, length ball on off, and he tries to muscle a shot towards the leg side. Spliced to the leg side
Lakmal to Starc, 1 run, length ball on middle, and the front-foot defense takes an inside edge! Goes through his legs to square leg

Lakmal to Patterson, OUT, lbw appeal, and the finger has gone up! Late seam movement does Patterson in. Full on middle, but jagging into Patterson's pads, he tries to drive towards mid-on, but misses, and the umpire raises his finger. Patterson reviews, though, given he's the last recognised batsman... but he's still gone. Crashing into leg stump. A positive debut innings comes to an end
Lakmal to Richardson, no run, length ball on middle, but going down leg as Richardson misses the flick first ball
Lakmal to Richardson, no run, full outside off, and he tentatively pushes away from his body. Ball rolls away to cover
Perera to Starc, no run, appeal for lbw, but not given. Length ball on middle that skids through, but Starc had inside-edged that onto his pad
Perera to Starc, FOUR runs, juicy, tossed up ball, and Starc takes a wild leg-side slog. Smacked over square leg, and that's four more
Perera to Starc, FOUR runs, full on leg stump again, and Starc slog sweeps over the fielder in the deep this time! Proper swing of the bat, no half-measures, and that's gone for another boundary
Perera to Starc, no run, tossed up, almost a yorker, and wedged back to the bowler
Perera to Starc, no run, full outside off, and another wild heave from Starc. Down on one knee, but misses completely

Perera to Starc, no run, another full ball, shoveled back straight, but the ball hits the non-striker's bat. Starc says no to the single, probably because of the contact off Richardson's bat. Sporting
Lakmal to Richardson, no run, length ball on middle, and going down leg. But Richardson tries to work it towards the leg side, and the ball hits his hip
Lakmal to Richardson, no run, full outside off stump, and he tries to drive away from his body. Misses
Lakmal to Richardson, 1 run, full on middle, and the attemped drive towards mid-on takes a leading edge to the off side instead. But Richardson gets his first Test runs in the process
Lakmal to Starc, no run, length ball on middle, and punched off the back foot to mid-on

Lakmal to Starc, SIX runs, smashed over long on! Full on middle, and he clears his front let to hammer a straight drive over the boundary. Boom! Crowd goes ballistic as a spectator takes an excellent catch in the stands
Lakmal to Starc, FOUR runs, clipped! Full on off, but Starc shuffles across the line before timing a sweet shot through the midwicket region
Perera to Richardson, no run, length ball, just outside off stump. He walks down the ground to fend towards the off side

Perera to Richardson, OUT, length ball, wide outside off, but Richardson skips down the wicket to lift a shot over mid-on. Unfortunately, for him, it's taken a leading edge to the off side... and cover takes an easy catch. Australia lead by 179
